header.name: John Doe
header.title: Full Stack Developer
header.bio: Passionate software engineer with 5+ years of experience building web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and learning new technologies.

experience.description: Led development of microservices architecture, mentored junior developers, and implemented CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 60%.
Built full-stack features using React and Node.js, collaborated with design team to improve UX, and maintained 99.9% uptime for critical services.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with honors. Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Web Development.
